18#include "QRBitMatrixParser.h"
19#include "QRVersion.h"
20#include "QRFormatInformation.h"
21#include "BitMatrix.h"
22#include "ByteArray.h"
23
24namespace ZXing {
25namespace QRCode {
26
27static inline int copyBit(const BitMatrix& bitMatrix, int i, int j, int versionBits, bool mirrored)
28{
29 bool bit = mirrored ? bitMatrix.get(j, i) : bitMatrix.get(i, j);
30 return (versionBits << 1) | static_cast<int>(bit);
31}
32
33static inline bool hasValidDimension(const BitMatrix& bitMatrix)
34{
35 int dimension = bitMatrix.height();
36 return !(dimension < 21 || (dimension & 0x03) != 1);
37}
38
39/**
40* <p>Reads version information from one of its two locations within the QR Code.</p>
41*
42* @return {@link Version} encapsulating the QR Code's version
43* @throws FormatException if both version information locations cannot be parsed as
44* the valid encoding of version information
45*/
46const Version* BitMatrixParser::ReadVersion(const BitMatrix& bitMatrix, bool mirrored)
47{
48 if (!hasValidDimension(bitMatrix))
49 return nullptr;
50
51 int dimension = bitMatrix.height();
52
53 int provisionalVersion = (dimension - 17) / 4;
54 if (provisionalVersion <= 6) {
55 return Version::VersionForNumber(provisionalVersion);
56 }
57
58 // Read top-right version info: 3 wide by 6 tall
59 int versionBits = 0;
60 int ijMin = dimension - 11;
61 for (int j = 5; j >= 0; j--) {
62 for (int i = dimension - 9; i >= ijMin; i--) {
63 versionBits = copyBit(bitMatrix, i, j, versionBits, mirrored);
64 }
65 }
66
67 auto theParsedVersion = Version::DecodeVersionInformation(versionBits);
68 if (theParsedVersion != nullptr && theParsedVersion->dimensionForVersion() == dimension) {
69 return theParsedVersion;
70 }
71
72 // Hmm, failed. Try bottom left: 6 wide by 3 tall
73 versionBits = 0;
74 for (int i = 5; i >= 0; i--) {
75 for (int j = dimension - 9; j >= ijMin; j--) {
76 versionBits = copyBit(bitMatrix, i, j, versionBits, mirrored);
77 }
78 }
79
80 theParsedVersion = Version::DecodeVersionInformation(versionBits);
81 if (theParsedVersion != nullptr && theParsedVersion->dimensionForVersion() == dimension) {
82 return theParsedVersion;
83 }
84 return nullptr;
85}
86
87/**
88* <p>Reads format information from one of its two locations within the QR Code.</p>
89*
90* @return {@link FormatInformation} encapsulating the QR Code's format info
91* @throws FormatException if both format information locations cannot be parsed as
92* the valid encoding of format information
93*/
94FormatInformation
95BitMatrixParser::ReadFormatInformation(const BitMatrix& bitMatrix, bool mirrored)
96{
97 if (!hasValidDimension(bitMatrix))
98 return {};
99
100 // Read top-left format info bits
101 int formatInfoBits1 = 0;
102 for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
103 formatInfoBits1 = copyBit(bitMatrix, i, 8, formatInfoBits1, mirrored);
104 }
105 // .. and skip a bit in the timing pattern ...
106 formatInfoBits1 = copyBit(bitMatrix, 7, 8, formatInfoBits1, mirrored);
107 formatInfoBits1 = copyBit(bitMatrix, 8, 8, formatInfoBits1, mirrored);
108 formatInfoBits1 = copyBit(bitMatrix, 8, 7, formatInfoBits1, mirrored);
109 // .. and skip a bit in the timing pattern ...
110 for (int j = 5; j >= 0; j--) {
111 formatInfoBits1 = copyBit(bitMatrix, 8, j, formatInfoBits1, mirrored);
112 }
113
114 // Read the top-right/bottom-left pattern too
115 int dimension = bitMatrix.height();
116 int formatInfoBits2 = 0;
117 int jMin = dimension - 7;
118 for (int j = dimension - 1; j >= jMin; j--) {
119 formatInfoBits2 = copyBit(bitMatrix, 8, j, formatInfoBits2, mirrored);
120 }
121 for (int i = dimension - 8; i < dimension; i++) {
122 formatInfoBits2 = copyBit(bitMatrix, i, 8, formatInfoBits2, mirrored);
123 }
124
125 return FormatInformation::DecodeFormatInformation(formatInfoBits1, formatInfoBits2);
126}
127
128/**
129* <p>Reads the bits in the {@link BitMatrix} representing the finder pattern in the
130* correct order in order to reconstruct the codewords bytes contained within the
131* QR Code.</p>
132*
133* @return bytes encoded within the QR Code
134* @throws FormatException if the exact number of bytes expected is not read
135*/
136ByteArray
137BitMatrixParser::ReadCodewords(const BitMatrix& bitMatrix, const Version& version)
138{
139 if (!hasValidDimension(bitMatrix))
140 return {};
141
142 BitMatrix functionPattern;
143 version.buildFunctionPattern(functionPattern);
144
145 bool readingUp = true;
146 ByteArray result(version.totalCodewords());
147 int resultOffset = 0;
148 int currentByte = 0;
149 int bitsRead = 0;
150 int dimension = bitMatrix.height();
151 // Read columns in pairs, from right to left
152 for (int j = dimension - 1; j > 0; j -= 2) {
153 if (j == 6) {
154 // Skip whole column with vertical alignment pattern;
155 // saves time and makes the other code proceed more cleanly
156 j--;
157 }
158 // Read alternatingly from bottom to top then top to bottom
159 for (int count = 0; count < dimension; count++) {
160 int i = readingUp ? dimension - 1 - count : count;
161 for (int col = 0; col < 2; col++) {
162 // Ignore bits covered by the function pattern
163 if (!functionPattern.get(j - col, i)) {
164 // Read a bit
165 bitsRead++;
166 currentByte = (currentByte << 1) | static_cast<int>(bitMatrix.get(j - col, i));
167 // If we've made a whole byte, save it off
168 if (bitsRead == 8) {
169 result[resultOffset++] = static_cast<uint8_t>(currentByte);
170 bitsRead = 0;
171 currentByte = 0;
172 }
173 }
174 }
175 }
176 readingUp ^= true; // readingUp = !readingUp; // switch directions
177 }
178 if (resultOffset != version.totalCodewords())
179 return {};
180
181 return result;
182}
183
184} // QRCode
185} // ZXing
